name: Workplace Sleep Syndrome
description:
Must... not... sleep...

Stuck working in a boring office?

Falling deeper and deeper into sleep?

The sleepier you get, the better you can see your dreams. Venture deeper into your dream world and do your best to stay awake with the help of coffee and alarm clocks. But beware, your dream world is full of alluring traps and enemies which make you even sleepier.
If your boss catches you asleep, you may not have a job for too long!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48 by:
Lucky90Happy - character art, environment art and level design.
Noctiluca - character, cutscene, menu art and playtesting.
Lobstah - UI art.
Iman - programming, design and music.
